https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/icHaCqGaJnUmFGHu12vy5lQ0CgC.jpg A young mother refusing to go see Durga bishorjon with her son. Bishorjon takes place with immense celebrations as the two Bengals drown their Durga idols in the river Ichamati separating them. The young lady remembers one such day after bishorjon in her past.
